column4: angeline l. marando known affectionately as ""angie"" passed away peacefully at the delaware home for the chronically ill in smyrna
column6: 2015 at the age of 86. angeline was born on december 29
column8: de. she was the daughter of the late quinto and lucy sulpizi. she was the wife of 49 years to the late thomas c. marando. angeline graduated from brown vocational high school in 1946. she worked briefly as a nurse aide. angeline was a homemaker. throughout her lifetime she enjoyed cooking
column11: and spending time with her family. angeline is survived by five children
column14: patricia kirkwood of st. leonard md
column18: seven grandchildren and seven great-grandchildren. a graveside service will be held at 11:00 am on thursday june 18

column20: de. pastor joel byler will officiate. arrangements are in the care of hannigan
